org.apache.archiva.indexer

Interface ArchivaIndexManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MavenIndexManager

    public interface ArchivaIndexManager

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String DEFAULT_INDEX_PATH 
      static String DEFAULT_PACKED_INDEX_PATH 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addArtifactsToIndex(ArchivaIndexingContext context, Collection<URI> artifactReference)
      Adds a list of artifacts to the index.
      ArchivaIndexingContext createContext(Repository repository)
      Creates the indexing context for the given repository.
      ArchivaIndexingContext mergeContexts(Repository destinationRepo, List<ArchivaIndexingContext> contexts, boolean packIndex)
      Merges a list of contexts into a single one.
      ArchivaIndexingContext move(ArchivaIndexingContext context, Repository repo)
      Moves the context to a new directory.
      void pack(ArchivaIndexingContext context)
      Compresses the index to a more dense packed format.
      void removeArtifactsFromIndex(ArchivaIndexingContext context, Collection<URI> artifactReference)
      Removes a list of artifacts from the index.
      ArchivaIndexingContext reset(ArchivaIndexingContext context)
      Reinitializes the index.
      void scan(ArchivaIndexingContext context)
      Rescans the whole repository, this index is associated to.
      boolean supportsRepository(RepositoryType type)
      Returns true, if this manager is able to apply the index actions for the given repository type.
      void update(ArchivaIndexingContext context, boolean fullUpdate)
      Updates the index from the remote url.
      void updateLocalIndexPath(Repository repo)
      Updates the local path where the index is stored using the repository information.

        ArchivaIndexingContext createContext(Repository repository)
                              throws IndexCreationFailedException
        Creates the indexing context for the given repository.

        Returns:
        the index context
        Throws:

      • reset

        ArchivaIndexingContext reset(ArchivaIndexingContext context)
                      throws IndexUpdateFailedException
        Reinitializes the index. E.g. remove the files and create a new empty index.
        Parameters:
        context -
        Returns:
        the new created index
        Throws:
        IndexUpdateFailedException

      • move

        ArchivaIndexingContext move(ArchivaIndexingContext context,
                            Repository repo)
                     throws IndexCreationFailedException
        Moves the context to a new directory. It's up to the implementation, if a new context is created or the context is moved only.
        Parameters:
        context - The current context
        repo - The repository
        Returns:
        The new context
        Throws:
        IndexCreationFailedException

      • updateLocalIndexPath

        void updateLocalIndexPath(Repository repo)
        Updates the local path where the index is stored using the repository information.

      • mergeContexts

        ArchivaIndexingContext mergeContexts(Repository destinationRepo,
                                     List<ArchivaIndexingContext> contexts,
                                     boolean packIndex)
                              throws UnsupportedOperationException,
                                     IndexCreationFailedException
        Merges a list of contexts into a single one.
        Parameters:
        destinationRepo - The destination repository
        contexts - The contexts of the indexes that should be merged.
        packIndex - True, if the merged index should be packed, otherwise false.
        Returns:
        The merged context
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - if the underlying implementation does not allow to merge indexing contexts
        IndexCreationFailedException
